content: Non-interest income increased $7.5 million versus the trailing quarter, driven by an increase in gains on sales of REO, partially offset by decreases in BOLI income, wealth management income, loan prepayment fees, gains on loan sales, swap income, and gains on securities transactions, Including provisions for credit losses on commitments to extend credit and merger-related charges, operating expenses were an annualized 1.89% of average assets for the current quarter compared with 1.92% in the trailing quarter, and 1.85% for the third quarter of 2021.
